ru.bit.torrent

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.bit.torrent.Message
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BitfieldMessage, HaveMessage, PieceMessage, RequestMessage

    public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
    Message class represents a Peer-to-Peer message in the protocol (Unchoke, Interested, Piece, etc.). Has static methods to encode and decode to/from Input/Output streams. Handles all p2p communication.
    Author:
    Dylan Murray, Charles Zuppe, Jonas Schreiber

      • sendHandshake

        public static void sendHandshake(java.io.DataOutputStream out,
                 byte[] handshake)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Sends a handshake out and expects a handshake back. If it does not receive a handshake back or if the peer ID/ infoHash is not as expected, it will return false.
        Parameters:
        in -
        out -
        handshake -
        infoHash -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • decode

        public static Message decode(java.io.DataInputStream in)

        Throws:

      • generateByteArray

        public byte[] generateByteArray()
        Generates the generic message in byte array format. (ie Choke, Unchoke, Interested, Not interested. Special messages will override).
